data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Kashiwa's Cristiano misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 3, Koei Koya awards Kobe a goal kick.
Koei Koya signals a free kick to Kobe.
Koei Koya awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Kobe pushes forward through Andres Iniesta, whose finish on goal is saved.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashiwa.
In the minute 12, Koei Koya signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 13, Koei Koya signals a Kobe throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
Koei Koya has awarded Kobe a corner.
Yuta Goke (Kobe) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 15, Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashiwa's half?
Goal! Kashiwa take a 1-0 lead through a well-placed header from Michael Olunga.
Cristiano instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 22, Hotaru Yamaguchi of Kobe gets in a strike, but is off target.
Kashiwa have a goal kick.
In Kashiwa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 24, Goal kick for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Dyanfrez Douglas (Kobe) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 27, Corner awarded to Kobe.
Daigo Nishi (Kobe) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Kobe takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 28, Koei Koya has awarded Kobe a corner.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in the half of Kobe.
Kobe needs to be cautious. Kashiwa have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 31, Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
Kashiwa drives forward and Takuma Ominami gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 32, Kashiwa drive upfield and Michael Olunga gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kobe defender.
Kashiwa to take a throw-in in Kobe territory.
Can Kobe capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashiwa's half?
In the minute 36, Kobe drive into the zone and Andres Iniesta is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
Throw-in Kobe.
In the minute 37, Koei Koya signals a Kobe throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
Kashiwa take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Ataru Esaka.
Free kick Kobe.
In the minute 42, Kyogo Furuhashi (Kobe) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Kashiwa defenders.
Throw-in for Kobe at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Goal! Kashiwa extend their lead to 3-0 through Michael Olunga.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Kashiwa.
In the minute 46, Koei Koya signals a throw-in for Kashiwa, close to Kobe's area.
Throw-in for Kobe in their own half.
Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Kashiwa.
In the minute 48, Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashiwa's half?
Cristiano of Kashiwa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Kashiwa to take a throw-in in Kobe territory.
In the minute 52, Goal! Ataru Esaka extends Kashiwa's lead to 4-0.
Masatoshi Mihara with an assist there.
Free kick for Kashiwa in the half of Kobe.
In the minute 56, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
Throw-in for Kobe close to the penalty box.
In the minute 58, Ryuho Kikuchi is replacing Yuta Goke for Kobe at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
The away team replace Sergi Samper with Junya Tanaka.
Goal! Junya Tanaka pulls one back to make it 4-1.
In the minute 60, Great play from Daigo Nishi to set up the goal.
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 61, Koei Koya awards the away team a throw-in.
Ryuho Kikuchi is booked for the away team.
Throw-in Kashiwa.
Kashiwa make their first substitution with Tatsuya Yamashita replacing Yuta Kamiya.
In the minute 65, Corner awarded to Kobe.
Kashiwa have a goal kick.
Koei Koya awards Kobe a goal kick.
In the minute 66, Shunki Takahashi is replacing Naoki Kawaguchi for the home team.
Koei Koya signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
In the minute 72, Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Kobe.
Shunki Takahashi (Kashiwa) has received a yellow card from Koei Koya.
In the minute 73, Kobe have been awarded a corner by Koei Koya.
Kobe to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
Koei Koya signals a free kick to Kobe.
In the minute 74, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashiwa.
Junya Tanaka strikes to reduce the deficit to 4-2 at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
That's a fine assist from Gotoku Sakai.
In the minute 76, Goal kick for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
Kashiwa have been awarded a corner by Koei Koya.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Kobe in their own half.
Kobe's Junya Tanaka is on target but unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 79, Play has been interrupted briefly in Kashiwa to check on Masatoshi Mihara, who is grimacing with pain.
Yusuke Kobayashi (Kashiwa) has replaced the possibly injured Masatoshi Mihara at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Throw-in for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Kashiwa.
Ball safe as Kobe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Koei Koya signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 86, An attacking Kobe player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Andres Iniesta's spot-kick reduces the deficit 4-3.
In Kashiwa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 89, Junya Tanaka (Kobe) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Koei Koya.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashiwa.
Free kick for Kashiwa in the half of Kobe.
Throw-in for Kobe at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Ball safe as Kobe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Koei Koya signals a Kobe throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
Free kick Kashiwa.
Koei Koya awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kobe's half?
Koei Koya signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Kobe's half.
Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Kashiwa.
That's full-time at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium. The final score is 4-3.
Kashiwa's Shunki Takahashi has been shown a second yellow card and sent off.
